title: Action Comics-Back in Action (841-843) [NVS-D]
description:
A Novus Release




This torrent includes the HD version.
  
 


*Note: You can download all or only choose which version you'd prefer by deselecting the one you don't want when you add the torrent to your client software. If you're adding the torrent via magnet link, you can deselect any undesired file in the list of files once the torrent has begun downloading.

========================================================







Gathers Action comics 841-843, titled "Back in Action".


In deep space, a group of aliens scans the universe in search of various valuables for their benefactor, the Auctioneer. Learning of Earth, they pinpoint several key locations to attack, in the hopes of acquiring large-scale consumables for their intergalactic customer base. 

In Metropolis, Superman battles his old foe Carapax. He receives unexpected help from Firestorm who transforms the copper wiring in Carapax's armor into germanium, incapacitating him. As the Metropolis SCU arrive to collect Carapax, Firestorm wonders if the real Superman has returned or if he might actually be an imposter. Leaving for Washington, Firestorm comes across some insectiod robots stealing a cathedral. 






Thanks goes to the OkC.O.M.P.U.T.O for this release.
